products.html.title: Products - Tiger BioSciences™
products.html.meta_description: Explore Tiger BioSciences' comprehensive portfolio of CAMPs, tissue products, and medical devices for wound care, aesthetics, and surgical applications.
products.html.hero_subtitle: From advanced wound care to aesthetic solutions, our vertically integrated approach ensures the highest quality products for healthcare professionals worldwide.

science.html.title: Our Science - Tiger BioSciences™
science.html.meta_description: Discover the science behind Tiger BioSciences' CAMPs technology, research pipeline, clinical trials, and innovations in regenerative medicine.
science.html.hero_subtitle: Our research teams combine decades of tissue science expertise with cutting-edge biotechnology to develop next-generation regenerative medicine solutions.

wound-care.html.title: Wound Care Solutions - Tiger BioSciences™
wound-care.html.meta_description: Advanced wound care solutions using CAMPs technology for chronic wounds, diabetic ulcers, and complex wound management.
wound-care.html.hero_subtitle: Clinically proven CAMPs technology for faster healing and better patient outcomes in chronic and complex wound management.

regenerative-medicine.html.meta_description: Regenerative medicine solutions leveraging tissue engineering and CAMPs technology for healing and restoration.
